question: Who among the following won the “Lata Mangeshkar Award” for the year 2019-20?
explanation: Usha Khanna won the “Lata Mangeshkar Award” for the year 2019-20. She is an Indian music director in Hindi cinema. Asha Bhosle won this award in 1999. Pushpa Pagdhare and Krishna Kalle won the award in 2017 and 2014 respectively.
